item.description:
Zev Eisenberg will be presenting more of the progress and discoveries he's made putting the UIGestureRecognizer class to work -- and to great effect.  He'll be prepared to be as technical or basic as the assembled group requires.   

So: Let's make the most of his generous offer and come with some questions, which he's probably already faced and solved! 

 

When I asked what might best help me get acquainted with that class before the meeting, Zev recommended me to going to developer.apple.com and click on the wwdc2010 videos. A link there will open the directory of videos in iTunes. The two related sessions are:

Session 120 - Simplifying Touch Event Handling with Gesture Recognizers
Session 121 - Advanced Gesture Recognition

- - - - - - 

Before that begins we will probably have a roundtable discussion of other topics.  Feel free to bring your concern or discovery and bounce it off of or sell to the group.  

 - - - - - -

We'll plan to wrap it up by 8:30 or so. 

I hope you can make it.
item.how_to_find_us: First floor office facing Franklin Arterial
item.name: Talk iOS: UIGestureRecognizer w/Zev Eisenberg + more thrills!
